message: Starting investigation of current JSON and SQLite structures for data migration planning
Analyzing current JSON and SQLite structures - found 44 tasks in GLOBAL_REGISTRY with 102 active agents (stale data)
Analyzing architecture: Dashboard reads GLOBAL_REGISTRY.json directly, MCP uses state_db.reconcile_task_workspace() partially, need full migration strategy
Designing comprehensive migration plan from JSON to SQLite as single source of truth
Creating detailed migration script specification with error handling and backward compatibility

Completed data migration plan design. Delivered: 3-phase migration strategy, migration script specification, dashboard API changes, and backward compatibility approach. Key insight: 44 tasks in JSON vs 5 in SQLite shows urgent need for migration.
